document_data.name: Fogli Forkbeard
document_data.mainbody: '''Fogli Forkbeard''' was a [[gnome]] in [[Raurin]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|72}}
document_data.Possessions: Fogli Forkbeard had a room at [[Happy Hogan's Desert Igloo]] in the [[Sandvoyagers Compound]] at the time of [[Khalitharius]]'s release in {{yearlinkName|1356}}. He did not often actually sleep in his room. Under the bed, there was a chest marked with his name; beneath some clothes, it had 12 pounds of silver and 8 pounds of gold.<ref group="note">The amounts in 1{{st}} edition are given in coins of different weights; for the sake of edition neutrality, the total mass amounts are shown instead of the coin count.
